title: G2 Support Main LF ADC duo
body: Looking for an ADC main to duo with, looking for a serious non toxic player looking to climb. Main thresh, but can play a wide variety of support champions. I play a couple games weekday afternoons and usually mid day on weekends, thanks.

replies.body:
I'm currently Silver 5 and main adc also looking for players to join my new rank team,If you are willing to test me out in a normal idm.

Main Order:{{champion:22}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:110}} {{champion:236}} 

Champs i don't prefer:{{champion:42}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:202}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:15}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:82}} 

Favourite:Skillshots
Solo Queue:Passive>Aggressive 
Duo/Team:Passive=Aggressive

And I'm an extreme active player you will see on on every day mostly night.
